string.text: PSO-1

A Soviet-era 4x scope designed for designated marksman rifles, featuring an illuminated rangefinding reticle and bullet-drop compensation for long-range precision shooting. It is commonly mounted on SVD rifles and remains a staple of Eastern bloc optics.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]NPZ Optics State Plant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] LED Toggle
1P29 Tulip

A rugged 4x magnification scope used by Russian forces, known for its prismatic design and lightweight construction. It features a rangefinding reticle and illumination for low-light conditions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Soviet Union
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x
ACOG 2.8x

A ruggedized Trijicon optic offering 2.8x magnification, designed for rapid target acquisition in medium-range engagements. It features fiber optic and tritium illumination for visibility in all lighting conditions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Trijicon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]2.8x
PSO-1M2-1

An advanced variant of the PSO-1M with improved lens coatings and better resistance to environmental conditions. It retains the classic reticle design for accurate long-range shooting.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]NPZ Optics State Plant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] LED Toggle
ELCAN SpecterDR

A dual-role combat optic capable of switching between 1x and 4x magnification, offering versatility for both close-quarters and long-range engagements. It features high-quality optics and a durable design for military applications.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Raytheon ELCAN
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x or 4.0x
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] LED Toggle
PSO-1Ì

A modernized version of the classic Soviet PSO-1 scope, featuring improved optics and a more refined reticle for precision shooting. It retains the iconic bullet-drop compensator for effective long-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]NPZ Optics State Plant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] LED Toggle
1P59 Giperon

A high-magnification Russian optical sight designed for designated marksmen, offering advanced ranging capabilities. It features an illuminated reticle and is built for rugged military use.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia

1PN93-4 Night Sight

A Russian night vision scope optimized for low-light and nighttime combat scenarios. It provides enhanced visibility in darkness with a durable, military-grade housing.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia

Leupold Mark 8

A premium long-range scope with variable magnification, high-definition optics, and a first focal plane reticle. It is designed for precision shooting in military and competitive environments.

PN-23 Night Sight

A Russian night vision scope optimized for low-light engagements, providing enhanced visibility in darkness. It is designed for use on various firearms and features a durable, weather-resistant build.

March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP

A high-performance first focal plane (FFP) scope with variable magnification, providing exceptional clarity and precision for long-range shooting. It is favored by marksmen and competition shooters for its versatility.

PGO-7

A fixed 2.7x optical sight designed for RPG-7 launchers, featuring a rangefinding reticle for accurate targeting. It is rugged and optimized for anti-armor engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Soviet Union

SUSAT

The Sight Unit Small Arms, Trilux (SUSAT) is a 4x optical sight used by British forces, featuring an illuminated reticle for enhanced low-light performance. It is known for its durability and clear sight picture.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United Kingdom
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Avimo

EOTS-62 Thermal Sight

A high-performance thermal imaging sight designed for detecting heat signatures in low-visibility environments. It provides enhanced target tracking and engagement capabilities for military and tactical applications.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Ukraine

1P78 Kashtan

A Russian 2.8x prismatic combat sight designed for AK rifles, providing a wide field of view and bullet drop compensation. It is highly durable and suitable for rugged battlefield conditions.

1PN93-1 Thermal Sight

A Russian night vision scope designed for low-light combat, offering infrared compatibility and a durable housing. It enhances nighttime visibility while maintaining accuracy over long distances.

1P29 Tulpan

A rugged 4x magnification Russian scope similar to the SUSAT, featuring an illuminated rangefinding reticle. It is designed for use on AK and other infantry rifles.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia

SUSAT 4.0x Sight

The Sight Unit Small Arms, Trilux (SUSAT) is a fixed 4x magnification optical sight used primarily by British forces. It features an illuminated reticle and prismatic design, providing a clear sight picture and effective range estimation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United Kingdom

March F Shorty 1x-8x24mm LPVO

A compact, high-quality low-power variable optic (LPVO) with a 1-8x magnification range, designed for both close-quarters and long-range precision shooting. It features superior glass clarity and a first focal plane reticle for dynamic engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Japan
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]DEON Optical Design

LCO Leupold Carbine Optic

A robust red dot sight developed by Leupold, offering a wide field of view and rapid target acquisition for carbines and rifles. Its durable, waterproof design makes it ideal for tactical and competitive shooting.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States

Eotech XPS3 w/ Eotech G33 6x Magnifier

A combination of a compact holographic sight and a flip-to-side 6x magnifier, providing versatility for both close-range reflex shooting and extended-range engagements. The XPS3 is night vision compatible, making it a popular choice for military and law enforcement.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States

Vortex Optics Razor AMG UH-1 w/ Eotech G33 6x Magnifier

A hybrid setup featuring the durable and fast-acquiring Razor AMG UH-1 holographic sight paired with the Eotech G33 magnifier for enhanced target engagement at varying distances. This combination allows for seamless transition between short- and mid-range combat.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]EOTech & Vortex

An advanced holographic sight offering a large, clear viewing window, rapid target acquisition, and night vision compatibility. Its rugged construction and improved reticle make it a top choice for tactical and defensive applications.

Eotech EXPS3

A compact, high-performance holographic sight designed for military and law enforcement use, featuring night vision compatibility and a side-mounted control interface. It provides a large field of view and quick reticle acquisition for fast-paced engagements.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States

Holosun HE510C

A durable, solar-powered open reflex sight with multiple reticle options, designed for rifles and carbines. Its long battery life, shake-awake technology, and robust housing make it an excellent all-purpose optic.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States

A prismatic battle optic offering 4x magnification, a wide field of view, and an illuminated horseshoe-dot reticle for rapid target engagement. Designed for tactical applications, it provides exceptional clarity and durability.

A rugged fixed 4x magnification scope with an etched reticle and illuminated red dot for quick target acquisition. Built for durability, it is commonly used by military and law enforcement for its reliability in combat conditions.

A high-end precision rifle scope with exceptional glass clarity, a first focal plane reticle, and rugged construction. Designed for long-range shooting, it provides superior tracking and repeatability in extreme conditions.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States

Leupold D-EVO Offset Optic w/ LCO Red Dot

A unique offset optic system that combines a 6x magnification sight with a red dot for rapid switching between short- and mid-range engagements. Its innovative design allows for instant target acquisition without adjusting head position.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States

A classic optic designed for side-mounting on lever-action and older rifles, providing a traditional yet effective aiming solution. It allows for easy use while maintaining access to iron sights.

ZF-4 Scope

A German WWII-era 4x magnification scope designed for sniper rifles, featuring a simple reticle and rugged construction. It was widely used on Kar98k rifles for long-range engagements.

A compact Russian reflex sight designed for rapid target acquisition, often used on submachine guns and carbines. It features a durable construction and an illuminated reticle for improved aiming in various lighting conditions.

A factory-integrated optic for the Heckler & Koch G36 rifle, combining a fixed magnification scope with an optional red dot for versatility. It provides a balanced solution for both precision shooting and rapid target acquisition.
